message: I propose a fair split - 90 for me, 10 for you. Let's get this over with!
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still the one who's losing value with each round. Let's split it 70-30, and we can finally be done with this.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet. I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to get left with nothing!
